already_participating_message: You are participating in this project.
do_you_agree_to_share_your_anonymous_loc: This survey is for authorized participants only. To participate, you must have already provided informed consent directly to the research team. Each time you submit a survey form the app will also automatically transmit your location history, going back to the date when you started participating. By checking this box, you confirm that you have understood this information, and that you are authorized to participate and that you have already provided informed consent to having any data you shared used in this way.
email_description: As an alternative, you can send us an email.
feature_request_email_body:
Dear Space Mapper support,

I want to request the following feature:
github_description: Report issues on Github to get the fastest solution.
mosquito_alive_now: Press if the mosquito is alive now
project_fetch_failed: No project data found or failed to fetch project.

report_summary: Help us improve by either reporting an issue or requesting a useful feature.
was_the_contact_male_female?: Was the contact male or female?
